title: LP loss on connection loss.
body: I was in queue and had banned a champion awaiting my pick when unknowingly i lost connection.. earlier in the day i had looked away for a second and got dropped from queue which i understand the loss i had there, but i lost 25 LP for the connection loss, either that or the last game i won lied about how much LP i had. said i had 12 and won 15, i have 2 just because i lost connection for 2 minutes.... doesnt seem fair... if you see my history its rare that i ever miss queue

replies.body: You can lose LP as well as enter a lower priority queue for leaving champion select in a ranked match.  This is known as [queue dodging](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging), and it can escalate by increase time and LP loss with multiple dodges.  Please let me know if you are having any connection issues and I'd be happy to help you get back in the game.

Disconnects in champ select are usually caused by connection issues. [Troubleshoot them.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
